General.Name: Solteq PLC
General.Description: Solteq Oyj provides digital business solutions and industry-specific software in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Poland, and the United Kingdom. It operates through two segments, Solteq Software and Solteq Digital. The company offers Solteq Commerce Cloud, a point of sale system for retail businesses and restaurants; Solteq Care, an electronic journal system designed for product development in municipality health care; Solteq Tooth, a dental system for handling records and patient-oriented administrative tasks. In addition, it offers Solteq Tekso, a cash register system for specialty shops and grocery retail; Solteq Order Engine for improved customer experience and streamlined processes in omnichannel environments; Solteq Smart Dealer, a solution for streamlined back-end processes and high-quality customer meetings; Solteq WebService, a cloud-based ERP system for vehicle maintenance and after-sales services; and  Trafi -query, a search portal for accessing up-to-date vehicle and customer information from the Trafi ATJ Database; and Solteq Connector, an integration platform to update the data between systems. Further, the company provides Solteq Electricity Distribution to enhance strategic business planning with off-the-shelf Saas solution for DSOs; Solteq Electricity Trade to digitalize electricity sales process; Solteq i4U product family tools for digital customer engagement for district heating, water supply, and energy companies; Solteq inWorks product family browser-based customer data management and invoicing systems; and S2B Energia, a customer information system built with salesforce technology, as well as analytics for energy and water companies, and consulting services for energy and water companies. The company was formerly known as Tampereen Tiedonhallinta. Solteq Oyj was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Vantaa, Finland.
